name: Days Inn Kodak-Sevierville Interstate Smokey Mountains

reviews.text: Worst hotel I have ever stayed at and I travel extensively.
reviews.title: horrible horrible horrible
Average hotel stay
reviews.text: 2. Towels were thin and worn out

reviews.title: Don't Stay Here!!
reviews.text: 3. Parkikng lot was full on our arrival, no place to park onsite

Just make sure you get a good rate for this hotel - full rate would be too much. This is a very clean place, spacious rooms, it seems to be well-managed, friendly staff, breakfast items were replenished while we were there eating.
reviews.title: Good for a night - clean, no complaints

reviews.text: It might be too close to the main road, therefore, not quiet inside, however, all other hotels are. I would stay there again for the same rate.
reviews.title: We will continue to stay

reviews.text: I wanted to let everyone know that my husband and I have stayed in this hotel on multiple occasions. We are small business owners and have been in the area a lot during the winter of 2007/08. The price is great, the rooms are very clean (we have stayed in several different rooms and all of them were very clean), the staff is extra friendly and the property has a safe atmosphere. The breakfast served includes cereal, waffles, donuts, toast, bagels, fruit and juice. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is planning to stay in the area. Like a said before, we have been staying here because of business but we will also stay here when we vacation in the Smokey Mountains. It is a great location with easy access to all the local attractions. STAY HERE-YOU WANT REGRET IT!!!
reviews.title: OK for the night

reviews.text: I stopped at the Days Inn on my way to Texas, it was late and we just needed a place to sleep. The night clerk was pleasant and the room was big enough for the 2 of us. The room was clean, beds were ok. The bathroom was average. The free breakfast was so-so, I had to feed my son again when we got out on the road. Overall not bad for just a place to sleep
reviews.title: Smells like dirty stinky armpits!!!

likes.disliked: — didn't feel secure in the room, horrible smell

reviews.text: This is by far the worst place I've ever been. As soon as we entered the room, the stinky smell almost made me faint. My husband said our room smelled like cat pee and I'd say it smelled like stinky armpits.
reviews.title: Had an Excellent stay

aka: Days Inn Kodak-Sevierville Interstate Smokey Mountains Hotel Kodak
